targets.rawSql: SELECT sum(ingressBytes) ingressBytes FROM deltafi."deltafiles" WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) LIMIT 100

SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, flow, sum(ingressBytes) " " 
FROM deltafi."deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) )
GROUP BY flow, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s
SELECT sum(files) ingressBytes FROM "deltafi"."deltafiles" WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) ) LIMIT 100
SELECT flow, sum(ingressBytes) ingressBytes FROM "deltafi"."deltafiles" WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) ) GROUP BY flow LIMIT 100
SELECT flow, sum(files) FROM "deltafi"."deltafiles" WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) ) GROUP BY flow ORDER BY flow ASC LIMIT 100

SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, flow, sum(files) " " 
FROM deltafi."deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) )
GROUP BY flow, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s

SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, flow, sum(filtered) " " 
FROM deltafi."deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime )
GROUP BY flow, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s

SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, flow, sum(egressed) " " 
FROM deltafi."deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime )
GROUP BY flow, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s

SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, flow, sum(errored) " " 
FROM deltafi."deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime )
GROUP BY flow, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT flow FROM deltafiles WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime )
list.label: Flow
list.name: flow
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT flow FROM deltafiles WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime )
